name: Chhandamita D
position: L&D and OD lead with 19 Years in BFSI/Fintech/(RealEstate in UAE) -expertise of LXP/LMS, Training Project Management, Sales & Sales Quality in B2C and B2B.
about: Experience in Learning And Development for sales channel management, and quality assurance, customer success, sales productivity & project management . Learning Needs Analysis.  Stakeholder Management  Instructional Design (ADDIE model)  Training Design & Delivery (classroom, virtual, e-learning, gamification)  Leadership Development (LDP)  Learning Management Systems (LMS) select & implement  Employee Engagement, Coaching, Mentoring, Retention  Evaluation, Assessment & Reports  Team Management Expertise - Excellent communication skills -verbal & written, effective customer relationship management ,solid organizational management skills, Negotiation, and Analytical skills, Managing medium to a large team, Coordination with multiple stakeholders, Meet deadlines, Apt in use of the digital platform, an expert in the use of online training tools, Sound Decision making, Knowledge on financial process & operation. Project Management - Project Life Cycle, Risk Issues. Insurance and Insurtech & Fintech. Training Modules - Situational leadership, 4DX, one-minute manager, life & health & Group life insurance products, Customer Behavioral, Adult learning principles, Process, knowledge & information management. Technology - Understanding of future ready technology required in work field Microsoft suite, Creative clouds, data analysis tools with other SAAS products, Agile technology & use of the digital platform, storytelling, gamification, knowledge of Sapiens and other Insurtech/fintech products, conducting a webinar and virtual learning, Learning Management system (LMS), storyboard and instructional design platform, power BI, SQL, use of Fintech platform. Understanding of Agile Methodology. Domain- L&H & Group-(Life Insurance ,health insurance, personal lines, annuity plans, family protection) & Fintech platform. missmita04@gmail.com +919354102485 / +971556369809
